props.name: new Color
props.desc: Color class The purpose of

props.name: colorNameMap
props.desc: Map of the 148 color names with HEX code

props.name: reHex
props.desc: Regex matching color in HEX format (ex: #FF5544CC, #FF5555, 010155, aff)

props.name: reHSLa
props.desc: Regex matching color in HSL or HSLA formats (ex: hsl(200, 80%, 10%), hsla(300, 50%, 80%, 0.5), hsla( 300 , 50% , 80% , 0.5 ))

props.name: reRGBa
props.desc: Regex matching color in RGB or RGBA formats (ex: rgb(0, 0, 0), rgba(255, 100, 10, 0.5), rgba( 255 , 100 , 10 , 0.5 ), rgb(1,1,1), rgba(100%, 60%, 10%, 0.5))

props.name: fromHex
props.desc: Returns new color object, when given a color in HEX format

props.name: fromHsl
props.desc: Returns new color object, when given a color in HSL format

props.name: fromHsla
props.desc: Returns new color object, when given a color in HSLA format

props.name: fromRgb
props.desc: Returns new color object, when given a color in RGB format

props.name: fromRgba
props.desc: Returns new color object, when given a color in RGBA format

props.name: fromSource
props.desc: Returns new color object, when given color in array representation (ex: [200, 100, 100, 0.5])

props.name: sourceFromHex
props.desc: Returns array representation (ex: [100, 100, 200, 1]) of a color that's in HEX format

props.name: sourceFromHsl
props.desc: Returns array representation (ex: [100, 100, 200, 1]) of a color that's in HSL or HSLA format. Adapted from

props.name: sourceFromRgb
props.desc: Returns array representation (ex: [100, 100, 200, 1]) of a color that's in RGB or RGBA format

props.name: getAlpha
props.desc: Gets value of alpha channel for this color

props.name: getSource
props.desc: Returns source of this color (where source is an array representation; ex: [200, 200, 100, 1])

props.name: overlayWith
props.desc: Overlays color with another color

props.name: setAlpha
props.desc: Sets value of alpha channel for this color

props.name: setSource
props.desc: Sets source of this color (where source is an array representation; ex: [200, 200, 100, 1])

props.name: toBlackWhite
props.desc: Transforms color to its black and white representation

props.name: toGrayscale
props.desc: Transforms color to its grayscale representation

props.name: toHex
props.desc: Returns color representation in HEX format

props.name: toHexa
props.desc: Returns color representation in HEXA format

props.name: toHsl
props.desc: Returns color representation in HSL format

props.name: toHsla
props.desc: Returns color representation in HSLA format

props.name: toRgb
props.desc: Returns color representation in RGB format

props.name: toRgba
props.desc: Returns color representation in RGBA format
